main: ^Oh, another survivor? I thought I am the only one left... ugh, my stupid arm..
bywaj: ^Disturb... As if I were super busy...
bywaj2: ^Eh... Of course. You're probably just in my imagination anyways...
atl_level: ^What happened? I don't remember myself at this point, the atl level was rising so fast, the whole building started to collapse... I'm not sure what exactly happened... a tragedy I suppose...
^Oh, well, I guess I will not learn much from you, bye.
glue: ^I am slowly dying anyways, but if you had a glue or something else to attach my arm back... That would allow me to leave in peace.
^I am willing to even give you this mace of power in return. Do you want that?
^I don't have anything like that. Sorry..
trade: ^Oh my, finally I can be whole again, thank you, whoever you are!
